Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .l4INK64V3wIju2AS]] attacks.

Blinding Flash.name: Blinding Flash
Blinding Flash.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the user’s next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{Hold Person} (level 4 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else’s voice, a lion’s roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can’t create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Hold Person.name: Hold Person
Hold Person.description:
Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Humanoid for each spell slot level above 2.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target’s base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can’t deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Detect Life.name: Detect Life
Detect Life.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically senses the direction of creatures up to 1 mile away that aren’t Constructs or Undead.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .EcKrguAvYxOpoFCS]] attacks and uses [[/item .BgXdOU6xf5CiGoyc]].

Horrify.name: Horrify
Horrify.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] [[lookup @range.units activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Deathly Wail.name: Deathly Wail
Deathly Wail.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a mournful wail if it isn’t in sunlight.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mnlRA4ivGOORPiBs]], each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mnlRA4ivGOORPiBs]] feet that can hear the wail and isn’t a Construct or an Undead.

Failure: If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Barbed Hide.name: Barbed Hide
Barbed Hide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

damage.condition: start of each of its turns

Diabolical Restoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmClaws000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] attack, or it makes two [[/item .mmHurlFlame00000]] attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from both claws.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description:
If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from both claws.

Escape Tests (see source item for DC)

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Hurl Flame.name: Hurl Flame
Hurl Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmTormentingBite]] attack and two [[/item .mmThrash00000000]] attacks.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPhantasmal]{Phantasmal Killer} (level 6 version)

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Entangle.name: Entangle
Entangle.description:
Grasping plants sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into &Reference[difficultterrain]. They disappear when the spell ends.

Each creature (other than you) in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Phantasmal Killer.name: Phantasmal Killer
Phantasmal Killer.description:
You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusion of its deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d10 Psychic damage and has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the spell ends.

For the duration, the target makes a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failed save, it takes the Psychic damage again. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 4.

Fears Manifested.name: Fears Manifested
Fears Manifested.description:
The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls for the duration.

For the duration, the target makes a [[/save ability=wis]] saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failed save, it takes the Psychic damage again. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Petrifying Gaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
Petrifying Gaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees its reflection in the [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make this save.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Petrified.name: Petrified
Petrified.description: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBeard000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmInfernalGlaive]] attack.

Beard.name: Beard
Beard.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the user's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Infernal Glaive.name: Infernal Glaive
Infernal Glaive.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn’t already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]].

Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and uses [[/item .mmConstrict00000]].

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] [[lookup @range.units activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled and Restrained.name: Grappled and Restrained
Grappled and Restrained.description:
Escape Tests (see source item for DC)

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows the target, which is no longer &Reference[Grappled apply=false]. While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Beholder.description:
Beholder

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmEyeRays0000000]] three times.

Antimagic Cone.name: Antimagic Cone
Antimagic Cone.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s central eye emits an antimagic wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]. Until the start of the beholder’s next turn, that area acts as an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF] spell, and that area works against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s own Eye Rays.

Eye Rays.name: Eye Rays
Eye Rays.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d10]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Charm Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] or until it takes damage.

Success: Half damage only.

2: Paralyzing Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

4: Slowing Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]] damage. Until the end of the target’s next turn, the target’s Speed is halved; the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both.

Success: Half damage only.

5: Enervation Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Success: Half damage only.

6: Telekinetic Ray.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is Gargantuan).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target up to [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]]. in any direction. The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn or until the beholder has the Incapacitated condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a tool or opening a door or container.

7: Sleep Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is a Construct or an Undead).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]]. The condition ends if the target takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

8: Petrification Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q67AgIfRplRO2e9p]]. First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

9: Disintegration Ray.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] damage. If the target is a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force, a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] of it disintegrates into dust.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.

10: Death Ray.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage.

Failure or Success: The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 Hit Points.

Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 1 hour or until it takes damage.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description:

Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Acid Breath.name: Acid Breath
Acid Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Corrosive Form.name: Corrosive Form
Corrosive Form.description:
A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll takes [[/damage average]] damage. Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

In 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2 feet of nonmagical wood or metal.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

Damaged: -1 Attack.name: Damaged: -1 Attack
Damaged: -1 Attack.description: Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the attacking creature and coming into contact with it.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]] Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

Split.name: Split
Split.condition: is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage.

Dissolving Pseudopod.name: Dissolving Pseudopod
Dissolving Pseudopod.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

Damaged: -1 AC.name: Damaged: -1 AC
Damaged: -1 AC.description: Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Astral Implosion.name: Astral Implosion
Astral Implosion.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In [[/r 1d20#Years]] years, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmPseudopod00000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmEngulf00000000]]. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmRestrainingGlo]].

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature or object whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

While engulfed, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea.

Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.name: Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained
Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.description: At the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

Restraining Glob.name: Restraining Glob
Restraining Glob.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] lobs a slimy glob at [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] feet of itself.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]], the targeted [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The glob rolls the target 60-feet straight toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] damage only.

Save.name: Save
Save.chatFlavor: On Hit: Target pulled 60 ft toward creature.

Glob: Restrained.name: Glob: Restrained
Glob: Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Decay.name: Decay
Decay.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=Seq1WbVdQNorBsTL]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Grasping Glob.name: Grasping Glob
Grasping Glob.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmRestrainingGlo]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=EsTerwQE7jI9CDxE]] damage if the target is &Reference[Bloodied].

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes 3 [[/item Mutating Claw]] attacks.

Mutating Claw.name: Mutating Claw
Mutating Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]].

Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description:
On failing a Constitution save, the target is cursed.

The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

Bloodied Fury.name: Bloodied Fury
Bloodied Fury.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended average]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=iBenqFiBu40bUxkH]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=iBenqFiBu40bUxkH]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage 2d8 average type=piercing]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition if the attacking creature used its moving attack feature.

Diabolical Restoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance

Infernal Sting.name: Infernal Sting
Infernal Sting.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Serpentine Gaze.name: Serpentine Gaze
Serpentine Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bGW2oiqqCLkz9eaZ]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=bGW2oiqqCLkz9eaZ]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=bGW2oiqqCLkz9eaZ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creatures’s next turn.

Multiattack.description: The naga makes two [[/item .4rHsvA6o5SCJIuOo]] attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of [[/item .hINC0uXwiT3mG6gu]].

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn’t move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Smelting Charge.name: Smelting Charge
Smelting Charge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and [[lookup @range.special activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]

Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters a creature’s space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]); if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a creature Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Prone & Restrained.name: Prone & Restrained
Prone & Restrained.description:

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]], +5 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithP]{Speak with Plants}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplVitriolicS]{Vitriolic Sphere}

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Ray of Sickness.name: Ray of Sickness
Ray of Sickness.description:
You shoot a greenish ray at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 Poison damage and has the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Speak with Plants.name: Speak with Plants
Speak with Plants.description:
You imbue plants in an immobile 30-foot Emanation with limited sentience and animation, giving them the ability to communicate with you and follow your simple commands. You can question plants about events in the spell’s area within the past day, gaining information about creatures that have passed, weather, and other circumstances.

You can also turn &Reference[difficultterrain] caused by plant growth (such as thickets and undergrowth) into ordinary terrain that lasts for the duration. Or you can turn ordinary terrain where plants are present into Difficult Terrain that lasts for the duration.

The spell doesn’t enable plants to uproot themselves and move about, but they can move their branches, tendrils, and stalks for you.

If a Plant creature is in the area, you can communicate with it as if you shared a common language.

Vitriolic Sphere.name: Vitriolic Sphere
Vitriolic Sphere.description:
You point at a location within range, and a glowing, 1-foot-diameter ball of acid streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10d4 Acid damage and another [[/damage 5d4 type=acid]] damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half the initial damage only.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The initial damage increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 4.

Lingering Acid.name: Lingering Acid
Lingering Acid.description: The creature takes [[/damage 5d4 type=acid]] damage at the end of its next turn

Bullywug Warrior.description:

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command} (level 3 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]{Dominate Person} (level 8 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only)

Alter Self.name: Alter Self
Alter Self.description:
You alter your physical form. Choose one of the following options. Its effects last for the duration, during which you can take a Magic action to replace the option you chose with a different one.

Aquatic Adaptation. You sprout gills and grow webs between your fingers. You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

The Active Effect provided by the Aquatic Adaptation activity upgrades the character's Swim Speed to a value of "1" to indicate equivalence to (walk) Speed.

Change Appearance. You alter your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another species, though none of your statistics change. You can’t appear as a creature of a different size, and your basic shape stays the same; if you’re bipedal, you can’t use this spell to become quadrupedal, for instance. For the duration, you can take a Magic action to change your appearance in this way again.

Natural Weapons. You grow claws (Slashing), fangs (Piercing), horns (Piercing), or hooves (Bludgeoning). When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Aquatic Adaptation.name: Aquatic Adaptation
Aquatic Adaptation.description: You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Natural Weapon.name: Natural Weapon
Natural Weapon.description: When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn’t move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as “Attack that creature,” “Move over there,” or “Fetch that object.” The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn’t receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 6 (up to 10 minutes), 7 (up to 1 hour), or 8+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmParalyzingTent]] and makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack.

Paralyzing Tentacles.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
Paralyzing Tentacles.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description:
The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Jumper.name: Jumper
Jumper.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

Speak with Animals.name: Speak with Animals
Speak with Animals.description:
For the duration, you can comprehend and verbally communicate with Beasts, and you can use any of the Influence action’s skill options with them.

Most Beasts have little to say about topics that don’t pertain to survival or companionship, but at minimum, a Beast can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever it has perceived within the past day.

Diabolical Restoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmChain000000000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmConjureInferna]].

Conjure Infernal Chain.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
Conjure Infernal Chain.description:
The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

Success: The chain disappears.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Unnerving Gaze.name: Unnerving Gaze
Unnerving Gaze.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: A creature the devil can see

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two chains, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from one of two chains, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

Drone.name: Drone
Drone.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons automatically succeed on this save).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. The target succeeds automatically after 10 minutes or if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to empty a flask of Holy Water on it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Drone for 24 hours.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmRam00000000000]] attack, one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack, and one [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of [[/item .mmFireBreath0000]] if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=HN2sfAtHqDMjMLXF]] damage if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had Advantage on the attack roll.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success:Half damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Sense Magic.name: Sense Magic
Sense Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic} spell but isn’t itself magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes 2 [[/item Pincer]] attacks and uses [[/item Paralyzing Tentacles]].

Paralyzing Tentacles.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
Paralyzing Tentacles.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description:
The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two pincers.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

Acid Absorption.name: Acid Absorption
Acid Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to &Reference[Acid] damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: On each of its turns while berserk, the creature attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the creature attacks an object. Once the creature goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer &Reference[Bloodied apply=false].

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Slam]] attacks, or it makes three Slam attacks if it used Hasten this turn.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Acid damage taken.

Hasten.name: Hasten
Hasten.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] and &Reference[Disengage] actions.

Light Sensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
Light Sensitivity.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Attach]] attack and two [[/item Tail]] attacks.

Attach.name: Attach
Attach.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Attach attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

Detach Attempt.name: Detach Attempt
Detach Attempt.condition: Action taken by the target or creature within range of it

Attached: Blinded.name: Attached: Blinded
Attached: Blinded.description: While attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition.

Phantasms.name: Phantasms
Phantasms.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image} spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.description:
Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it’s impossible to track which image is real.

Each time a creature hits you with an attack roll during the spell’s duration, roll a [[/r (@flags.dnd-players-handbook.mirrorImages)d6kh1cs>2#Duplicate destroyed]]{d6 for each} of your remaining duplicates. If any of the d6s rolls a 3 or higher, one of the duplicates is hit instead of you, and the duplicate is destroyed. The duplicates otherwise ignore all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it has the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition, &Reference[blindsight], or &Reference[truesight].

Moan.name: Moan
Moan.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Moan for the next 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmThunderousMace]] or [[/item .mmThundercloud00]] in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.NdueMCpXRc7fLDFa]].

Thundercloud.name: Thundercloud
Thundercloud.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

TJtpDWOIWpI3N5tk.name: Misty Step
TJtpDWOIWpI3N5tk.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The Sphere is &Reference[heavilyobscured]. It lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as one created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The fog’s radius increases by 20 feet for each spell slot level above 1.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn’t being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Control Weather.name: Control Weather
Control Weather.description:
You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell, and it ends early if you go indoors.

When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM. You can change precipitation, temperature, and wind. It takes 1d4 × 10 minutes for the new conditions to take effect. Once they do so, you can change the conditions again. When the spell ends, the weather gradually returns to normal.

When you change the weather conditions, find a current condition on the following tables and change its stage by one, up or down. When changing the wind, you can change its direction.

Precipitation
StageCondition
1Clear
2Light clouds
3Overcast or ground fog
4Rain, hail, or snow
5Torrential rain, driving hail, or blizzard
Temperature
StageCondition
1Heat wave
2Hot
3Warm
4Cool
5Cold
6Freezing
Wind
StageCondition
1Calm
2Moderate wind
3Strong wind
4Gale
5Storm

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it’s wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn’t being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell’s range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Siege Monster.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Divine Beam.name: Divine Beam
Divine Beam.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]]-foot long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]]-foot-wide line.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] damage.

Failure or Success: A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items it was wearing or carrying.

Smite.name: Smite

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], and it can make one [[/item Slam]] attack at any point during that move.

Training.name: Training
Training.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has proficiency in one skill of the DM’s choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.
